thread.title: Congratulations to CPAmerica Member Firms on their Recognition by Inside Public Accounting
thread.title_full: Congratulations to CPAmerica Member Firms on their Recognition by Inside Public Accounting

author: Sarah Coulson
title: Congratulations to CPAmerica Member Firms on their Recognition by Inside Public Accounting
text:
Inside Public Accounting (IPA), a highly regarded independent accounting publication, recently recognized four CPAmerica International member firms as the fastest-growing public accounting firms, and two CPAmerica members as most admired by peers. ”We are excited to congratulate all of our firms who have been recognized,” said Alan Deichler, president of CPAmerica. “The commitment that these firms have made to being great firms, being admired by their peers, and to growth is very impressive.”
CPAmerica congratulates the following members on their recognition:
David Deeter, co-founder and partner of Frazier & Deeter, LLC, was named to IPA’s 2015 Most Admired Peers.
Steve Knebel, leading partner of Maxwell Locke & Ritter LLP, was named to IPA’s 2015 Most Admired Peers. This is the third time Knebel has received this recognition.
CPAmerica congratulates the following firms on their recognition:
Honkamp Krueger & Co., P.C., headquartered in Dubuque, Iowa, ranked nine in IPA’s 2015 Fastest Growing Firms Over $5 Million.
Stratagem CPAs (formerly Bradley Consulting Group), headquartered in Lakewood, Colo., ranked four in IPA’s 2015 Fastest Growing Firms Under $5 Million.
Beasley, Mitchell & Co., LLP, headquartered in Las Cruces, N.M., ranked ten in IPA’s 2015 Fastest Growing Firms Under $5 Million.
N&K CPAs, Inc., headquartered in Honolulu, ranked four in IPA’s 2015 Fastest Growing Firms in the west.
About CPAmerica International:
CPAmerica International is an accounting association of independent CPA firms that provides practice management support, continuing education, marketing, online services and other programs for the improvement of its member firms. As a member of Crowe Horwath International, the association has more than 670 offices worldwide, and combined firm revenues of the alliance of more than $3 billion. Learn more about CPAmerica on the CPAmerica blog, LinkedIn and Twitter .
